chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
si: sorted_interface
misi: max_index_sanity_interface
smsi: state_machine_safety_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface

Goal:
forall (p : packet) (net : network) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (xs ys ps' : list packet) (st' : Net.name -> data) (e : entry), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \/ p' = {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := pSrc p; pBody := m |}) -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net (pDst p)) -> In e (log (nwState net (pDst p))) -> In e (log d)

Premises:
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pSrc {P params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
Record state_machine_safety_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_state_machine_safety_interface { state_machine_safety_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> state_machine_safety net } Arguments state_machine_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_state_machine_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
term = nat : Set
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope

raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then (RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntries

pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pDst {P params}

doLeader_message_entries : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e (log st)
handleAppendEntries_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st \/ currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ log st' = es \/ (currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli <> 0 /\ (exists e : entry, In e (log st) /\ eIndex e = pli /\ eTerm e = plt)) /\ log st' = es ++ removeAfterIndex (log st) pli
doLeader_messages : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> t = currentTerm st /\ log st' = log st /\ type st = Leader /\ (plt = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) pli = Some e /\ eTerm e = plt))

raft_invariant_handle_input' : forall (P : network -> Prop) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_timeout' P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request' P -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> (forall h' : Net.name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

handleAppendEntries_not_append_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> ~ is_append_entries m
